channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 05:28 Driven Alarm to Kamyansky District.Creck on Further Messages.
item.description: 游릭 05:28 Driven Alarm to Kamyansky District.Creck on Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 05:16 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kamyansky district- Dniprovskyi district-Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community
item.description: 游리 05:16 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kamyansky district- Dniprovskyi district-Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
